information_architecture.navigation_structure: Tab-based navigation with 4 primary sections: Sessions (home), Analysis, Library, Settings. Bottom tab bar follows iOS and Material Design patterns for immediate access to core functionality.
screen_hierarchy: Sessions (Home) - New recording and session management
Analysis - Real-time and post-recording analysis tools
Library - Historical sessions and tagged anomalies
Settings - Audio configuration and premium features
Session Detail - Individual session playback and tagging
Anomaly Detail - Focused anomaly review and annotation
Premium Upgrade - Subscription onboarding and management
information_architecture.user_flow_patterns: Guest-first experience with immediate value. Primary flow: Home > New Session > Record > Auto-detect anomalies > Review in Analysis. Secondary flows: Library browsing, Settings configuration, Premium upgrade at natural upgrade moments.

wireframes.layout_description: Prominent 'New Session' CTA at top, followed by recent sessions list with metadata (date, duration, anomaly count). Clean, professional layout optimized for quick session creation and management.
wireframes.interaction_patterns: Large touch targets for primary actions. Swipe actions on session cards for delete/share. Pull-to-refresh for session updates.
wireframes.accessibility_considerations: New Session button minimum 44pt/48dp. VoiceOver labels for all session metadata. High contrast session cards with semantic colors for status.

wireframes.layout_description: Central waveform visualization with real-time anomaly markers. Recording controls (start/stop/pause) prominently placed. Real-time level meters and recording status clearly visible.
wireframes.interaction_patterns: Single tap to start/stop recording. Long press for additional options. Gesture-based waveform navigation.
wireframes.accessibility_considerations: Audio feedback for recording state changes. VoiceOver announcements for anomaly detection. High contrast waveform visualization.

wireframes.layout_description: Detailed waveform with timestamp scrubbing, anomaly segments highlighted. Playback controls and segment isolation tools. Tagging interface for manual annotations.
wireframes.interaction_patterns: Pinch-to-zoom waveform. Tap anomaly markers for quick navigation. Drag to select audio segments for review.
wireframes.accessibility_considerations: Keyboard navigation for timeline scrubbing. Screen reader support for anomaly descriptions. Touch targets for precise audio control.

wireframes.layout_description: Organized list/grid view of all sessions with search and filter capabilities. Quick preview of session highlights and tagged anomalies.
wireframes.interaction_patterns: Search-first navigation. Filter by date range, location, anomaly count. Long press for batch selection.
wireframes.accessibility_considerations: Search field with clear labels. Filter options announced clearly. Grid/list toggle for different accessibility needs.

wireframes.layout_description: Clean value proposition with feature comparison. Transparent pricing display with clear benefits. Easy dismissal and restoration options.
wireframes.interaction_patterns: Clear pricing presentation with no dark patterns. Easy cancellation information. Restore purchases prominently available.
wireframes.accessibility_considerations: High contrast pricing text. Clear subscription terms. VoiceOver support for all pricing information and legal disclosures.

design_system.color_scheme: Professional dark theme with scientific precision aesthetic. Primary colors: Deep blue (#1565C0) and orange (#FF9800) for contrast. Backgrounds use rich blacks (#121212) with high contrast text (#FFFFFF). WCAG AA compliant 4.5:1 contrast ratios throughout.
design_system.typography: System fonts (SF Pro on iOS, Roboto on Android) with full Dynamic Type support. Clear hierarchy: H1 24pt/semibold, H2 20pt/medium, Body 16pt/regular, Caption 12pt/regular. Scales appropriately up to 200% for accessibility.
design_system.component_library: Material 3 baseline with iOS adaptations. Consistent button styles, form elements, and card layouts. Professional aesthetic avoiding entertainment/gaming visual language. Focus on data clarity and precision.
design_system.responsive_approach: Adaptive layouts for phone/tablet orientations. Component scaling for different screen sizes. Touch target optimization for various device sizes maintaining minimum accessibility standards.

standards_compliance.subscription_store_compliance: RevenueCat integration for all subscription handling. Clear pricing display on paywall with auto-renewal disclosure. Restore Purchases functionality prominently available. Premium features clearly distinguished with upgrade prompts at natural moments.
standards_compliance.accessibility_design: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance with 4.5:1 contrast ratios tested throughout. Minimum 44pt iOS/48dp Android touch targets. Full VoiceOver/TalkBack support with semantic labels. Dynamic Type support up to 200% scaling. Reduced motion alternatives for animations.
standards_compliance.privacy_analytics: Firebase Analytics with minimal data collection. No cross-app tracking or unnecessary identifiers. Privacy Policy linked in-app settings. Clear data usage disclosure for audio processing (local-only by default). User control over analytics opt-out.
standards_compliance.testing_release_readiness: Accessibility testing with screen readers and scaling. Subscription flow testing in sandbox environments. Multi-device testing across iOS/Android. Beta testing with target users (paranormal investigators). Performance testing for audio processing efficiency.
